front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Safety Levels with Respect to Human Exposure to Radio Frequency Electromagnetic Fields, 3 kHz to 300 GHz - Amendment: Specifies Ceiling Limits for Induced and Contact Current, Clarifies Distinctions between Localized Exposure and Spatial Peak Power Density

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This amendment to IEEE Std C95.1-2005 specifies ceiling values for induced and contact current, clarifies the distinctions between localized exposure and spatial peak power density, and corrects other known technical and editorial errors.
